hero.title: Century Heritage
hero.subtitle: Since 1862, Haude Tea has been dedicated to preserving the essence of Chinese tea culture

quality.title: Premium Produce
quality.description: Carefully selected premium red plums and seasonal produce from highland areas

traditional.title: Traditional Methods
traditional.description: Inheriting century-old agricultural techniques, combined with modern technology for optimal produce quality

culture.title: Agricultural Culture
culture.description: More than just product sales, we're dedicated to promoting the depth of Taiwanese agricultural culture

history.title: Historical Heritage
history.description: Haude Tea was established in 1862, witnessing the development of Chinese tea culture. We not only preserve traditional tea-making crafts but also dedicate ourselves to passing on the spiritual essence of tea culture to the next generation.
history.description2: From Taiwan to mainland China, from traditional tea houses to modern tea art galleries, Haude Tea has always adhered to the business philosophy of emphasizing both quality and culture.

archive.title: Century Tea Recipe Collection
archive.description: Treasured historical tea recipes and brewing secrets

products.title: Premium Products
products.description: Local premium produce, naturally and healthily cultivated

footer.tagline: Inheriting century-old tea culture, savoring Eastern tea essence

contactInfo.address: Address: No. 8, Lane 1, Taihe Village, Meishan Township, Chiayi County
